text: Shives (also Shrives) is an unincorporated community in Chicot County, Arkansas, United States. Shives is located on the southeast shore of Lake Chicot, approximately west of the Mississippi River. U.S. Route 278 passes through Shives, and Shives is the first settlement west of the Greenville Bridge. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Chicot County, Arkansas Category:Unincorporated communities in Arkansas
title: Shives, Arkansas
